edge: Sameer's girlfriend Roma breaks up with him because of his temper.
Sameer has anger-management issues since his parents died during his childhood.
Sameer falls in love with Rani.
Sameer disagrees with Pandit Raj Purohit Jyotshi, which angers Rani when she overhears him saying bad things about her.
Suraj makes Sameer think that he is a thief by asking him where he keeps important things (like money) in his luggage.
Suraj is a security guard at Sameer's resort.
arrives in the form of Sunny
anonymously gives Rani the money she needs for a fashion competition, calling himself her 'well-wisher'
gave Rani the money he had saved for his grandmother's eye surgery
gave Rani the money he had saved for his sister's wedding
takes credit for a painting of Rani by Sameer
assumes that they had sex when Rani sees a bar dancer sleeping in Sameer's room one morning
is now the leader of the Eagle Gang, a group of bikers who roam the streets of Goa and cause trouble
reconciles with the help of a magician at a New Year's Eve party
Pushespara mistakes Rani's mother for Rani and tries to persuade her to marry Sameer.
Sameer makes another attempt to apologize and tries to reunite with Rani
Suraj is Rani's uncle who now knows that Sameer loves Rani.
Sunny gets close to Rani because of Sameer's mistakes
Rani considers whether she loves Sameer or Sunny more
Sameer chases Sunny through the crowd at a cricket stadium where India and Pakistan are playing a friendly match.
Sameer takes the microphone from the guest of honour Kapil Dev
Rani runs onto the field and embraces Sameer, reuniting with him
Arun poses as Sameer's enemy to help him reunite with Rani and her parents
